home.title: Track your health with {brand}
home.subtitle: Understand your test results, track your journey, and make better decisions.
home.ctaSectionTitle: Ready to take control of your health?
home.ctaSectionSubtitle: Join thousands already tracking their health with MediTrack.

about.title: About {brand}
about.desc: MediTrack helps users track and understand their medical test results easily.
about.missionDesc: We're building the future of personal health management, making it easier for everyone to take control of their health journey.

login.subtitle: Sign in to your account or create a new one
login.name: Full Name

terms.title: Terms & Policy
terms.subtitle: Please review the terms and policies that govern your use of Medi Track.

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.p1: These are placeholder terms of service for Medi Track. By using the application, you agree to follow the guidelines, restrictions, and acceptable use policies described here. The service is provided ‘as is’ and may be updated periodically. Continued use constitutes acceptance of any changes.
tos.p2: Use of the service is subject to applicable laws and regulations. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for all activities under your account.

rights.title: User Rights & Responsibilities
rights.i1: You have the right to access, upload, and manage your lab test results within the app.
rights.i2: You agree to provide accurate information and to use the app in a lawful manner.
rights.i3: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials.
rights.i4: You may request correction or deletion of your data according to applicable laws.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Protection
privacy.p1: Medi Track prioritizes your privacy. We implement reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your personal data. Placeholder text: details on how your data is collected, stored, encrypted, and processed will be described here.
privacy.p2: We minimize data collection to what is necessary for providing the service and improve user experience. You can adjust privacy settings where available.

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.p1: The information provided by Medi Track, including insights, is for informational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Placeholder text: consult your physician for personalized medical guidance. Do not ignore or delay seeking professional advice because of information obtained through the app.

sharing.title: Data Sharing Rules
sharing.i1: We do not sell personal data. Placeholder for additional sharing rules.
sharing.i2: Data may be shared with your explicit consent or as required by law.
sharing.i3: De-identified, aggregated data may be used to improve services.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.p1: Have questions or concerns? Placeholder contact details: support@medi-track.example and 123-456-7890. Our support team will respond within a reasonable timeframe.

summary.allNormal: All results are within normal range
summary.disclaimer: These are preliminary insights. Consult a medical professional for advice.
